original_text: These people put their mark of authority on the promise that they had written:
korean_text: 그 인봉한 자는 하가랴의 아들 총독 느헤미야와 시드기야,

sentences.original_text: These people put their mark of authority
sentences.korean_translation: 이 사람들은 자신들의 권위의 표시를 찍었으며

sentences.original_text: on the promise that they had written:
